title: NEO Scavenger v0.984b
description:
NEO Scavenger
(c) Blue Bottle Games

Release date: 9/13/2013 
Protection: DRM-Free
Language: English
Version: 0.984b


NEO Scavenger is a turn-based, rogue-like RPG where you must
survive in the wasteland long enough to figure out who you are
Each turn you must decide where to go, how to scavenge for
supplies, and how to deal with anything and anyone you encounter
And with each passing minute, the pit in your stomach grows, your
dehydration worsens, your muscles tire, and your body temperature
drops in the cold autumn air. Choose your starting abilities
carefully, because they and your wit are the only tools you have in
the apocalypse!
